```{r}
city <- readRDS("../../data/citylevel/citycomb.rds") %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  mutate(y_corn = log(share_corn) - log(1 - share_corn - share_soy), 
         y_soy = log(share_soy) - log(1 - share_corn - share_soy))
```
